posts.post_content:
Hi all,
I have the following T206's available (please see link below).  All of the cards are available except the Brown Hindu's and the Southern Leaguers.  I haven't had time to post prices next to the cards yet, but please feel free to inquire about prices either by PM or e-mail.

Thanks,
Mark

posts.post_title: Please make offers on my remaining T206s
posts.post_content:
Everything in the above link is available if it has a price next to the back listing.

Thanks,
Mark

Please make an offer if something catches your eye.  The ones available are the cards with prices after the back listing.

Thanks,

Great cards Mark -- please do email me (aamoniz@yahoo.com) if you ever want to sell your SGC 30 Foster, as I'd love to pick that card up from you!

Good luck with the sales.

Best,
Adam
